monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Burns vines - Enkindles torches - Activates fire orbs
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: When this Monster uses an action, it only loses a third of its Charge stacks (rounded down).

skills.name: Armor Bypass
skills.description: This Monster's attacks ignore 20% of the target's Defense damage reduction value.

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Buff Celebration
skills.description: Aura: As long as a monster in your party has 4 or more Buffs at the beginning of a turn, it gains 3 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Buff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Buff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Charged Destruction
skills.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Burn, Weakness or Armor Break to a random enemy.

skills.name: Charged Healing
skills.description: This Monster's healing actions are affected by Charge stacks as if they were attacks.

skills.name: Charged Start
skills.description: This Monster starts combat with 7 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Cleansing Burn
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an ally applies Burn on an enemy or when an enemy takes Burn damage, 75% chance to remove a Buff from them.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Heat
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Fuel
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Burn damage, each Monster in your party gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Full Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (200 + 40% Magic) Applies Glory, Barrier, Channel & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Health Focus
skills.description: Health values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Health Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 5% of Max Health.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Ignite
skills.description: 3 x 55% (165%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 50% (200%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 65% (325%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Ignite Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 70% (420%) magical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Inferno
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Jolly Spirit
skills.description: Aura: For each Monster in the party, the first time they use a non-damaging action in combat, the skill costs 50% less Mana.

skills.name: Life Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 1.5% of this Monster's Max Health.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Powered Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 150% of Magic value.

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mega Restore
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (250 + 40% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs from all allies

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Mud Cannon
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Recover
skills.description: Heals 10% of this Monster's Max Health at the start of every turn.

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Slow Burn
skills.description: When this Monster uses an action, it only loses a third of its Charge stacks (rounded down).

skills.name: Soul Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Sustain
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Regeneration (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Sustain Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Regeneration (Buffs) to whole party

drops.name: Craft Box
drops.description: Consume to get random craft materials based on Keeper Rank.

drops.name: Monster Bell
drops.description: Respawns all defeated wild Monsters immediately
